abstrac: Full Stack Web Application Developer. PHP, Wordpress, AngularJS
bio: I'm an wap era developer at an age of 16. Started learning with curiosity for developing wap sites and started my footprint on Web Development in 2007. Freelanced an Web App during my college days, it turned into my profession and worked with successful & excellent clients on behalf of a company "Pertly" during 2012 to 2016. Few of the great clients i worked are VouchedFor UK, JoinTheTeem Global. It's my passion doing freelance. So, i started working as an complete independent freelancer. It's me! you are looking for an OO, enthusiastic, fast learning full stack Web Application Developer to work dedicate till accomplishing a commitment by alone or by collaborating with a team.
Willing to work on client preferable timing. I Honestly accept payment as per the guru.com terms.

abstrac: APPinc. brings cutting edge Information Technology in alignment with the best practices in Retail Finance Strategy to create a full end-to-end corporate solution.
bio:
APPinc. was founded in May 2013 when Mr. Beshouri and Dr. Barrios merged their talents and years of experience to form a state of the art consulting firm.  

Mr. Beshouri, with his 15+ years experience specializes in Corporate Retail Finance and Operations.  He has held several C-Level Positions in multimillion dollar organizations prior to private consulting. Please see Mr. Beshouri's LinkedIn profile for a detailed review of his expertise www.linkedin.com/pub/anthony-j-beshouri/6/247/461

Dr. Barrios brings with her more than 20 years of information technology experience where she specializes in Cyber Security and Master Data Management.  She has held positions as Sr.Software Developer, Sr. Database Administrator and Associate Professor at a private division 1 university.  Dr. Barrios was named to Michigan's Top 10 People to Watch in 2013.  Please see her Linked In profile for a detailed look in to her expertise www.linkedin.com/pub/rita-barrios-phd/1/753/3b4/

APPinc. offers our clients expertise in a wide range of strategic areas including Retail Finance, Accounting, POS Systems, Advanced Information Technology Systems as well as Cyber Security, Data Management and Intrusion Detection.  We also offer hardware infrastructure design and implementation with a focus on Apple OSx systems.

Hours: 40-60 hours per week/per team member
Payment Type Accepted: Check, CC
Payment Term Options: Retainer, Fixed Price and Time/Materials

Long and Short term assignments

bio:
No matter where I have been and what I've done, somehow I have managed to learn more than what was expected of me. Because of this, I am well versed in many different areas in life - both personally as well as professionally.

Some how either I'd either get taught, or I'd figure it out and put my own twist on things. And I've always been a fast learner and an even faster worker.With this in mind, I get things done with both speed and accuracy. So, I know what I'm doing.

And I look forward to working with you on your project!!

Payment method: I accept SafePay and PayPal only. Communication: I prefer to communicate mainly via email. This allows the recepient time to respond when they have free time. However, I am also available via phone for more urgent matters.

General Availibility: I am available most days during the week from 8:00 am to 9:00 pm. However, the only day I am not available is on Sundays.

Code of Ethics/Guarentee Policy: I will produce an end result within the agreed time frame, if not sooner. I will reply to all emails within a timely manner, and I expect the same. I will be in constant communication with my client about all aspects of the project. If the cliend is not happy with the end result, I will redo the work for a reduced rate, if not for free. But, the changes will be discussed ahead of time before the work is done.

Feedback/Endorsement: I will provide feedback for all clients when the project is completed. I will only endorse clients who provide a positive working experience.

abc

Accept the Buyer Payment Terms As We Know Our Worth.We do not have payment terms which are outside of the scope of the elance or the buyer terms. The fact is this is a buyers market and we as a service provider are just trying to retain clients.The best way to show clients we are confident in our work and serious about doing business is to accept the payment terms which the buyer suggests. Or we can ask the buyer to add the full amount or partial of the money into escrow until the job is completed. Additionally, we know our worth and bid an amount which we feel is reasonable, fair, and comfortable.

abstrac: 200+ SEO| SMM Projects| 150+ Web Development Projects | 90+ Full Time Employees in INDIA & UK ......!!!
bio:
Cognus Technology is a young & a vibrant Digital Marketing Agency offering complete E-Business Solutions like search engine optimization, social media marketing, website and E-Commerce development.

Our SEO experts adopt Google algorithm approved SEO techniques and process for attaining 1st page rankings for your website. 

On technology stack we have team of technical experts, who have core expertise in PHP, MYSQL, Joomla, WordPress, XHTML, CSS, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, HTML5 , Flash, OpenCart and the list continues. 

Areas Of Expertise :
- SEO/SEM/PPC
- E-Commerce solutions.
- Content Management System
- Web Design and Development

Facts & Figures
- A Leading SEO, SMM Provider in UK, US & India.
- An ISO-Certified IT company.
- Over 100+ Qualified professionals.
- Offices in UK & India.
- Customers in more than ten countries

Payment Terms : 
Mode 1. 
We can work on a project on monthly basis. We will take advance monthly payment every month till the decided time

Mode 2. 
We can work on the project on Fixed Cost. In this we will take 50% Advance & 50% after all keywords are on first page.

Cognus tries to keep project time to a minimum, but a project business concept, work scope and its complexity will determine the final turnaround time.

25% Upfront

25% at Project Midpoint 
25% at Project Completion 

For projects below US$1000, the payment terms are as follows: 

50% Upfront
